Name: pan-drmuhamadhabibb-la
Author: Dr. Muhamad Habib, Bhai Harpreet Singh, Maulana Wahiduddin Khan

Translations.Text: Phira phirana ne sahiram vica duta bheje
Iha loka chota jiha samuha hana
Ate inham ne sanu gusa diva'i'a hai
Ate asim sare saza-o-samana nala ham
Phira asim unham nu bagam ate casami'am vicom kadha dita
Ate khazani'am te cage gharam com vi
Iha ho'i'a. Ate asim isara'ila di aulada nu inham cizam da varisa bana dita
Phira unham ne suraja nikalade samem' unham da picha kita
Phira jadom dovem dala ahamom-sahamane ho ga'e tam musa de sathi'am ne kiha, ki asim tam pakare ga'e
Musa ne kiha, kade vi nahim besaka mera raba, mere nala hai. Uha mainu raha dikhavega
Phira asim musa nu vahi bheji ki uha apani soti dari'a te mare, isa la'i uha phata ga'i ate hareka bhaga ajiha ho gi'a, jivem vada pahara
Ate asim dusare dala nu vi unham de nere pahuca dita
Ate asim musa nu ate unham sari'am nu jihare usa de nala sana, baca li'a
Phira duji'am (phira'auna te usa de sathi'am) nu dauba dita
Besaka isa vica nisani hai ate unham vicom zi'adatara manana vale nahi
Ate besaka tera raba takatavara ate rahima karana vala hai
Ate unham nu ibarahima da kisa suna'u
